question: How to make a line break?
answer: A line break cannot be printed as a string (print_string), it has to be printed as a character (print_char). The following code can be used to print it:

li $a0 '
' #Loads the ASCII value of the character into the register a0

question: Can you put two labels consecutively?
answer: It is not allowed. The instructions can only be associated with one label. If a label is placed after another, the simulator will display a compilation error.
